content: Good morning! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. May I please have your name to get started with scheduling your electrical service?
Thank you, Margaret. Could you please provide your address so I can check if we service your area and schedule your appointment?
Thanks, Margaret. I see that your address is within our service area. When would be an ideal time for you to have our electrician visit?
I would prefer sometime next Tuesday afternoon, please.
Let me check our availability for next Tuesday afternoon.
We have an opening next Tuesday at 2 PM. Before I book your appointment, would you like a price estimate for the electrical service needed?
Yes, please send me the price estimate.
The typical cost for our electrical services starts at $200, depending on the specifics of the job. Does this fit within your budget?
Oh, that’s more than I was hoping to spend. It’s a bit too expensive for my budget.

I understand budget is a concern. Unfortunately, we aim to maintain service quality, so prices are set accordingly. Would you like me to connect you with one of our operators who might assist with possible alternatives or flexible plans?
No, that’s okay. I guess I won’t schedule anything right now. Thank you anyway.
reason: Customer declined due to price sensitivity
